scripts.setup-test: rm -rf ./someapp && meteor create --minimal someapp && cd someapp && cp ../.coverage.json . && meteor npm i --save puppeteer && mkdir packages && ln -s ../../ ./packages/roles
scripts.test: npm run setup-test && cd someapp && TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_JSON=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test-packages --raw-logs --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ./packages/roles; istanbul report --include .coverage/summary.json --root . --dir .coverage
scripts.test:watch: cd someapp && TEST_WATCH=1 COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test-packages --raw-logs --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ./packages/roles
